name: Esrever
description:
Game created on the Xmas Jam in 48 hours with the theme Upside-Down World

We had  3 constraints for  this jam

-Low Poly

-No interface 

-Highscore

Controls :

move : ZQSD

Teleport : Right Click

Jump : Space

Crédits:

Grégoire THOMASSIN : Programmeur

Victor  CALLOT : Programmeur

Léa MARTY: 2D Artist / Concept Artist

Chloé ZORZOPIAN: 3D Artist / VFX Artist / Character Artist

Tristan ROUX : 3D Artist / VFX Artist
